titleStmt.title: An apology for the ministers who subscribed only unto the stating of the truths and errours in Mr. William's book shewing, that the Gospel which they preach, is the old everlasting Gospel of Christ, and vindicating them from the calumnies, wherewith they (especially the younger sort of them) have been unjustly aspersed by the letter from a minister in the city, to a minister in the countrey.
titleStmt.author: Lorimer, William, d. 1721.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to William Lorimer.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
